headline: Why Is Warrren Buffett Bullish On Occidental Petroleum Corporation (OXY)?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 8 Best Value Dividend Stocks to Invest in According to Warren Buffett. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Occidental Petroleum Corporation (NYSE:OXY) stands against the other dividend stocks.
